com.illposed.osc

Class AbstractOSCPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illposed.osc.AbstractOSCPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OSCPacket
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OSCBundle, OSCMessage

    abstract class AbstractOSCPacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements OSCPacket
    OSCPacket is the abstract superclass for the various kinds of OSC Messages. The actual packets are:
    • OSCMessage: simple OSC messages
    • OSCBundle: OSC messages with timestamps and/or made up of multiple messages
